availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Kentucky native. Married Rachel Logsdon Durbin on February 9, 1832 in Edmonson County, Kentucky. Father of John H. Durbin, Richard Durbin, Rachel Ann Durbin, Rebecca Durbin, William P. Durbin, and Martin L. Durbin. Farmer in Edmonson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Edmonson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 43. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 8. Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, Film 000367220, p 197.
